兜.definition: pocket; bag; to wrap up or hold in a bag; to move in a circle; to canvas or solicit; to take responsibility for; to disclose in detail; combat armor (old)

兜兜.definition: an undergarment covering chest and abdomen

兜兜轉轉.definition: (lit. and fig.) to go around and around; to wander around

兜圈子.definition: to encircle; to go around; to circle; to beat about the bush

兜底.definition: to provide a safety net; (coll.) to reveal; to expose (sth disreputable)

兜抄.definition: to close in from the rear and flanks; to surround and attack; to mop up (remnant enemy troops)

兜捕.definition: to round up (fugitives); to corner and arrest

兜攬.definition: to canvas (for customers); to solicit; to advertise; to drum up; sales pitch; to take on (a task)

兜肚.definition: undergarment covering the chest and abdomen

兜風.definition: to catch the wind; to go for a spin in the fresh air
